creation.title: Create New Task
creation.description: Describe what you want to build

empty.title: No tasks yet
empty.description: Create your first task to get started

kanban.emptyBacklogHint: Add a task to get started
kanban.emptyQueueHint: Tasks will wait here when parallel task limit is reached
kanban.cannotEditWhileRunning: Cannot edit while task is running
kanban.deleteConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to permanently delete these tasks?
kanban.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. All task files, including the spec, implementation plan, and any generated code will be permanently deleted from the project.

queue.limitReached: Parallel task limit reached ({{current}}/{{max}}). Task moved to queue.
queue.autoPromoted: Task auto-promoted from queue to In Progress.

settings.title: Queue Settings
settings.description: Configure the maximum number of tasks that can run in parallel
settings.hint: When this limit is reached, new tasks will wait in the queue before moving to In Progress

files.title: Files
files.selectFile: Select a file to view its contents

notifications.backgroundTaskDescription: The task is still running. You can reopen this dialog to monitor progress.

wizard.createDescription: Describe what you want to build. The AI will analyze your request and create a detailed specification.
wizard.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the feature, bug fix, or improvement you want to implement. Be as specific as possible about requirements, constraints, and expected behavior.

worktreeNotice.title: Isolated Workspace
worktreeNotice.description: This task runs in an isolated git worktree. Your main branch stays safe until you choose to merge.

errors.createFailed: Failed to create task. Please try again.

review.mergeTooltip: Merges changes from the task's worktree branch back to your base branch. AI will resolve any conflicts.

edit.title: Edit Task
edit.description: Update task details including title, description, and settings.

errors.updateFailed: Failed to update task. Please try again.

form.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the feature, bug fix, or improvement you want to implement.
form.titlePlaceholder: Leave empty to auto-generate from description
form.titleHelpText: A short, descriptive title will be generated automatically if left empty.
form.requireReviewDescription: When enabled, you'll be prompted to review the spec and implementation plan before the coding phase begins.

classification.helpText: These labels help organize and prioritize tasks. They're optional but useful for filtering.

deleteDialog.title: Delete Task
deleteDialog.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete
deleteDialog.destructiveWarning: This action cannot be undone. All task files, including the spec, implementation plan, and any generated code will be permanently deleted.
